title: not enough disk space message
body: I have had league on this computer and I wanted to install it again, but now it gives me a message half way through updating saying I do not have enough disk space. Can someone help me please? Maybe with something that can control my mouse to see what's up?

replies.body: We don't have remote desktop assistance, but I'd like to help.  Do you have several drives?  You'll want to make sure it's going to your primary internal drive so you don't have installation issues, but upon opening the installer you should be able to double check your directory.  League is pretty big, so make sure it's going to your primary drive's path and that it has enough space.

upon opening the installer I should be able to check my directory. 
How do I check my directory? what is my directory? is it my drive?
I think I figured out what you mean, but I tried installing again and now the message is patching failed and were not sure why error 004. stopped patching at 70 percent

Hey, glad to hear progress is being made!  This error code suggests a possible security setting that's blocking your game files from installing properly.  The steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help with that!
Thank you for your help. I am playing League again :)
